title: Integral Counseling
subtitle: Conversations that integrate mind, body, and context—grounded, compassionate, and action‑oriented when helpful.

individual.title: Integral Counseling Session
individual.description: One‑on‑one sessions tailored to your needs and context.
individual.approach: Integral model, mindfulness, parts work, somatic awareness, values clarification

approach.title: How I Work
approach.description: We integrate perspectives meaningfully and work at a pace that fits your life, focusing on clarity, agency, and practice.

collaborative.title: Collaborative
collaborative.description: We co‑create a direction that fits your life.

strength.title: Strength‑based
strength.description: We build on your strengths and resources.

cultural.title: Respectful
cultural.description: Your background, beliefs, and context are respected.
